trait.name: *2* Armor/Weapon Proficiencies
entries: {@table Armor and Shields; Armor|phb|Armors}: All armor, shields
{@table Weapons|phb|Weapons}: {@filter all simple weapons|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=simple weapon} , longsword, shortsword, longbow, shortbow

trait.name: *3* Equipment
entries: mason’s tools,dagger taken from a fallen enemy asa trophy

trait.name: *4* {@class Rogue|phb|Some Class Trait}
entries: Spellcasting Ability. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for your spells. The saving throw DC to resist a spell you cast is 13. Your attack bonus when you make an attack with a spell is +5. See the rulebook for rules on casting your spells.

trait.name: *5* {@class Rogue|phb|Some Class Trait}
entries: Disciple of Life. Your healing spells are particularly effective. Whenever you restore hit points to a creature with a spell of 1st level or higher, the creature regains additional hit points equal to 2 + the spell’s level.

trait.name: *6* {@class Rogue|phb|Some Class Trait}
entries: Darkvision. You see in dim light within a 60-foot radius of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness in that radius as if it were dim light. You can’t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

trait.name: *7* {@class Rogue|phb|Some Class Trait}
entries: Fleet of Foot. Your base walking speed is 35 feet.

trait.name: *8* {@class Rogue|phb|Some Class Trait}
entries: Mask of the Wild. You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

trait.name: *9* {@class Rogue|phb|Some Class Trait}
entries: Fey Ancestry. You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}. Magic can’t put you to sleep.

trait.name: *9B* {@class Rogue|phb|Some Class Trait}
entries: Mercenary Sergeant. You retain the rank of sergeant from your career as a soldier. Lower-ranking soldiers loyal to your military organization defer to you. You can invoke your rank to exert influence over other soldiers and requisition simple equipment or horses for temporary use. You can also usually gain access to friendly military encampments where your rank is recognized.

trait.name: *ZZZ* Notes
entries: {@b Armor Class}: 10 + CON, or worn armor rules

action.name: {@item Mace|phb}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. ({@dice 1d6 + 2}) damage.

trait.name: *2* Armor/Weapon Proficiencies
entries: {@table Armor and Shields; Armor|phb|Armors}: All armor, shields

trait.name: *4* {@class Fighter|phb|Second Wind}
entries: You have a limited well of stamina you
can draw on to protect yourself from harm. You can
use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d10} +
Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or
long rest before you can use it again.

trait.name: *5 Fighting Style (Defense)
entries: While you are wearing armor, you gain a +1 bonus to AC. This bonus is already

trait.name: *6*  Position of Privilege
entries: people are inclined to think the best of you. You are
welcome in high society, and people assume you have
the right to be wherever you are. The common folk
make every effort to accommodate you and avoid your
displeasure, and other people of high birth treat you as
a member of the same social sphere. You can secure
an audience with a local noble if you need to.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@dice 1d12 + 3}) damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. ({@dice 1d6 + 3}) damage in melee, or ({@dice 1d6 + 3}) damage at range.
